name: Push-Up
description: A foundational upper-body movement targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps. Great for building strength and stability.
benefits: Builds full upper-body strength, improves core stability, enhances shoulder health.
tips: Keep your body straight, engage your core, avoid flaring elbows too wide.

name: Incline Push-Up
description: A regressed version of the push-up, reducing load by elevating hands. Ideal for beginners or warm-ups.
benefits: Easier alternative to push-ups, perfect for beginners building strength.
tips: Use a stable elevated surface and maintain a straight body line.

name: Decline Push-Up
description: Feet-elevated push-up that engages upper chest and shoulders more intensely.
benefits: Targets upper chest and increases difficulty compared to normal push-ups.
tips: Avoid letting hips sag; control the descent for maximum engagement.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: A classic chest builder that improves strength, stability, and muscular balance using dumbbells.
benefits: Enhances chest development and improves left-right balance.
tips: Press dumbbells slightly inward and keep wrists straight.

name: Barbell Bench Press
description: A compound movement focusing on maximum chest strength and power.
benefits: Builds raw chest strength and allows lifting heavier loads.
tips: Keep feet planted, slight arch in lower back, avoid bouncing the bar.

name: Chest Fly
description: An isolation movement that stretches and contracts chest muscles deeply.
benefits: Improves chest definition and enhances muscle stretch and contraction.
tips: Use a slight elbow bend, avoid going too low to protect shoulders.

name: Pull-Up
description: A fundamental upper-body pull exercise developing lats, biceps, and grip strength.
benefits: Improves back width, grip strength, and overall pulling power.
tips: Avoid swinging; pull chest toward the bar for better lat activation.

name: Chin-Up
description: A curl-dominant pulling movement focusing heavily on biceps and lower lats.
benefits: Best bodyweight exercise for biceps and lower-lat engagement.
tips: Keep elbows close and avoid half-reps.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: A beginner-friendly pulling exercise mimicking the pull-up motion with adjustable weight.
benefits: Helps beginners build strength for pull-ups.
tips: Lean slightly back and pull elbows down, not hands.

name: Seated Row
description: A horizontal pulling exercise that builds mid-back thickness and posture.
benefits: Improves posture and strengthens upper-back muscles.
tips: Avoid rounding back; pull elbows toward your hips.

name: Barbell Deadlift
description: A full-body compound lift that strengthens back, legs, and core.
benefits: Builds full-body strength and increases functional power.
tips: Keep bar close to shins; hinge at hips, not back.

name: Dumbbell Row
description: A unilateral pulling exercise that increases back symmetry and lat engagement.
benefits: Fixes muscle imbalances and improves lat depth.
tips: Keep back flat and pull elbow toward hip.

name: Barbell Squat
description: A fundamental lower-body lift that develops quads, hamstrings, and glutes.
benefits: Builds powerful legs and overall strength.
tips: Keep knees in line with toes; avoid rounding the lower back.

name: Leg Press
description: A safe and controlled way to add heavy quad and glute training.
benefits: Allows lifting heavy without putting stress on your back.
tips: Do not lock knees at the top; keep feet flat.

name: Lunges
description: A unilateral leg exercise improving balance, coordination, and glute development.
benefits: Builds symmetrical legs and strong glutes.
tips: Keep front knee behind toes and maintain upright posture.

name: Romanian Deadlift
description: Targets hamstrings and glutes through hip-hinge mechanics.
benefits: Essential for posterior-chain development.
tips: Keep slight knee bend and push hips back while keeping spine neutral.

name: Leg Curl
description: Isolation exercise focused entirely on hamstrings for strength and injury prevention.
benefits: Strengthens hamstrings to prevent knee injuries.
tips: Control the negative portion; avoid lifting hips off the pad.

name: Standing Calf Raise
description: Strengthens calves with a deep stretch and full contraction.
benefits: Improves lower-leg definition and explosive power.
tips: Pause at the top; avoid bouncing.

name: Shoulder Press
description: A major shoulder builder developing overhead strength.
benefits: Improves overhead strength and shoulder size.
tips: Avoid arching your back; keep core tight.

name: Lateral Raises
description: Isolation exercise that widens your shoulders by targeting side delts.
benefits: Gives shoulders a wider, rounder shape.
tips: Raise arms slightly forward instead of directly sideways for safer shoulder mechanics.

name: Front Raises
description: Targets anterior deltoids for better front shoulder development.
benefits: Improves pressing strength and shoulder symmetry.
tips: Lift with control, avoid swinging torso.

name: Face Pull
description: Strengthens rear delts and upper back while improving posture.
benefits: Improves posture and shoulder health; prevents shoulder injuries.
tips: Pull rope toward forehead, keep elbows high.

name: Barbell Shoulder Press
description: A heavy compound overhead movement building powerful shoulders.
benefits: Maximizes overhead pressing strength.
tips: Keep wrists stacked over elbows; avoid leaning back excessively.

name: Bicep Curls
description: Classic isolation movement for biceps with full range of motion.
benefits: Increases arm size and strength.
tips: Avoid swinging; keep elbows fixed at your sides.

name: Hammer Curls
description: Targets the brachialis to build arm width.
benefits: Adds thickness to arms; improves grip strength.
tips: Keep wrists neutral and avoid rotating forearms.

name: Tricep Dips
description: A powerful tricep builder using parallel bars.
benefits: Great for tricep mass and upper-body pushing strength.
tips: Keep elbows tucked and avoid dipping too low.

name: Tricep Rope Pushdown
description: Isolation exercise to build tricep size and definition.
benefits: Provides constant tension for tricep growth.
tips: Spread rope ends at the bottom for maximum contraction.

name: Skull Crushers
description: A tricep-focused movement providing deep stretch and strong contraction.
benefits: One of the best exercises for tricep long-head development.
tips: Lower weight behind your head instead of toward your forehead to protect elbows.

name: Crunches
description: A simple core exercise focusing on upper abdominal contraction.
benefits: Improves upper-ab endurance and definition.
tips: Lift shoulder blades only; avoid pulling neck forward.

name: Plank
description: A static core stability exercise improving posture and endurance.
benefits: Enhances overall core stability and posture.
tips: Keep hips level, avoid drooping or raising too high.

name: Russian Twists
description: A rotational movement strengthening obliques and core stability.
benefits: Improves rotational core strength and stability.
tips: Keep your core tight; avoid rounding your back.

name: Leg Raises
description: Targets lower abs through hip flexion and control.
benefits: Best exercise for lower-ab development.
tips: Avoid swinging legs; keep lower back pressed into floor.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A dynamic core exercise that also improves conditioning and agility.
benefits: Great for cardio and core stability at the same time.
tips: Maintain a straight body line; avoid bouncing hips.

name: Burpees
description: A high-intensity movement combining a squat, push-up, and jump.
benefits: Burns fat rapidly and improves full-body conditioning.
tips: Land softly during jumps; maintain control.

name: Kettlebell Swing
description: A power exercise training hips, glutes, and core through explosive swings.
benefits: Builds explosive hip power and boosts conditioning.
tips: Hinge at hips, avoid squatting; drive with glutes.

name: Clean and Press
description: Olympic-style movement developing explosive power.
benefits: Improves athletic power, speed, and full-body strength.
tips: Keep bar close; use legs explosively; lockout overhead.

name: Kettlebell Goblet Squat
description: A squat variation performed while holding a kettlebell close to the chest to encourage proper squat depth.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
description: Targets the upper chest by pressing dumbbells on an incline bench.

name: Pendlay Rows
description: A strict barbell row performed from the floor to build explosive pulling strength.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
description: A single-leg squat variation with the rear leg elevated, great for quads and balance.

name: Box Jumps
description: An explosive jump onto a platform to develop power and explosiveness.

name: Seated Cable Row
description: A pull exercise focusing on back width and thickness.

name: Overhead Barbell Press
description: A compound shoulder press performed standing, building shoulder mass and core stability.

name: Romanian Deadlift
description: A hip-hinge movement focusing on hamstrings and glutes with minimal knee bend.

name: Cable Chest Fly
description: A cable variation of chest fly that keeps constant tension on the chest.

name: Rear Delt Fly
description: A bent-over fly movement that isolates the rear delts.

name: Step-Ups
description: A lower-body exercise mimicking stepping onto a raised surface, great for stability.

name: Face Pulls
description: A great corrective movement to strengthen rear delts and improve posture.

name: Push Press
description: A dynamic overhead press using leg drive for extra power.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: A classic back exercise targeting the lats through a vertical pulling motion.

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
description: A unilateral back exercise focusing on lat thickness and stability.

name: Decline Push-Ups
description: Push-ups performed with feet elevated to target upper chest and shoulders.

name: Hammer Curls
description: Targets the brachialis for thicker-looking arms.

name: Hip Thrust
description: A glute-focused movement performed by thrusting the hips upward under load.

name: Jump Rope
description: An effective cardiovascular exercise improving agility and endurance.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A full-body cardio exercise that engages the core while increasing heart rate.

name: Tricep Rope Pushdown
description: A tricep isolation exercise using a rope attachment for better range.

name: Farmerâ€™s Walk
description: Picking up heavy weights and walking to improve total-body strength and grip.

name: Burpees
description: A high-intensity full body movement combining squat, plank, and jump.

name: Glute Bridge
description: A beginner-friendly glute exercise performed by lifting the hips off the floor.
